text: Gurjars or Gujjars, a tribe in South Asia, are divided in a large number of clans. They have as many as 178 clans. * Awana * Adhana * Ambawata * Baniya * Bainsla * Bhadana * Bidhuri * Baisoya * Bakarwal * Bhati * Bagri * Bajjar * Chaprana * Charr * Chavda * Chechi * Dhakar * Dheda * Dogar * Doi * Kapasia * kharyper * Kohli * Koli * Khatana * Kushan * Lodha * Lobana * Lohsar * Gorsi * Hun * Maitrak * Meelu * Mundan * Mavi * Nagar * Vania * Ratala * Tas * Taank == References == Category:Gurjar clans of Pakistan Category:Ethnic groups in Afghanistan Category:Ethnic groups in Pakistan Category:Ethnic groups in India Category:Gurjar clans of India
title: Gurjar clans
